member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor accepting IP Address and Port number over which data will be exchanged.
member.param: IP Address of incoming data source.
Port over which data will be received.

member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor accepting only Port Number over which data will be exchanged. Data will be exchanged over ANY IP Address using this port number if IP_ADDRESS property is left blank.
member.param: Port over which data will be received.

member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.initializeMethod(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to initialize object taking both IP Address and Port Number as input.
member.param: IP Address from which to accept data.
Port over which data will be exchanged.

member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.initializeWithPORT_NUMBER(System.Int32)
member.summary: Used to initialize object taking only port number. Data will be accepted from any IP Address.
member.param: Port over which data will be exchanged.

member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.GetReceivedStringData
member.summary: Gets the data received over the specified IP Address and Port number and updates the ReceivedData property.
member.returns: Data Received over the given port.

member.name: M:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.GetReceivedByteData
member.summary: Gets data as a byte stream over the specified IP Address and Port number, and stores in the buffer.

member.name: P:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.PORT_NO
member.summary: Port over which data will be exchanged.

member.name: P:TCPConnector.TCPDataReader.IP_ADDRESS
member.summary: IP Address of incoming data source.
